short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It lets you calculate what amount you need to charge so that after deducting taxes/commissions you get the exact amount you desire.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now a days people are sellling thier services online and they need to pay different platform fee to different platforms like Fiverr charge 20% on every sale and steam community market charges 5% per sale. So if you're a seller and want to charge 50$ to your client you need to add that percentage amount in your invoice So that after all the deductions you'll get the amount you desired ($50).
With This calculator you mention the amount you require and below mention the tax (platform % Charges). It;ll calculate the amount for you
